legendaryGroup.name: Acantha
lairActions: When fighting inside her grove of horrors, Acantha can invoke the ambient magic to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Acantha takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Acantha casts the {@spell entangle} spell. While maintaining concentration on this effect, Acantha can't take other lair actions.
Acantha summons {@dice 1d4+1} {@creature blight minion|zcc|blight minions} in unoccupied spaces that she can see within 120 feet of her.

Poisonous spores fill a 10-foot cube that Acantha can see within 120 feet of her. Any creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until it is dispersed by a strong wind.

legendaryGroup.name: King Snurre
lairActions: A {@creature hell hound} that King Snurre can see immediately recharge and uses their fire breath.

{@dice 1d4} 10-foot-square pools of lava begin to rise from the floor in areas that King Snurre can see, and remain there for 1 minute. A creature that starts its turn in the pool of lava must succeed a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

King Snurre casts {@spell immolation|xge} (no components required; Save {@dc 15}) on a creature he can see within 90 feet. While he maintains concentration on this effect, King Snurre can't take other lair actions.
